title: Battle Axe
desc:
Post 1517
- Cut off a playerâ€™s limb of your choice, then make them draw 3 <:red:1106234051129507932> cards
- If a leg was cut off, your target can no longer negate card effects targeting them
- If an arm was cut off, your target has every other turn skipped
- If there were ever a case where a target would lose both of the same limb, that player is **Destroyed**
